remarks: Principle of ` _E ` induction (set induction).  If a property passes from all elements of ` x ` to ` x ` itself, then it holds for all ` x ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 10-Mar-2011.)
statement:
setinds.1 $e |- ( A. y e. x [. y / x ]. ph -> ph ) $.
setinds $p |- ph $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
